headline: A Look at AIG’s Valuation Following Recent Share Price Dip and Long-Term Gains
summary: American International Group (AIG) shares have seen a slight dip in the latest trading session, slipping about 2%. Over the past month, however, the stock has managed to climb by 4%, which reflects ongoing investor interest. See our latest analysis for American International Group. After a steady rise this year, American International Group’s 11.4% year-to-date share price return and five-year total shareholder return of 201.7% underscore growing confidence in its longer-term strategy, even...
